rules_text:
Reach
Anachronistic Hydra enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Anachronistic Hydra: Remove a time counter from a suspended card you own. Activate only as a sorcery.
notes:
If it ends up being too strong, a fun nerf could be Activate only during your upkeep.

Could cost XG?
